title: Enhancing the reaction kinetics and structural stability of high-voltage LiCoO2 via polyanionic species anchoring
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00726C, Paper
Wei Zheng, Gemeng Liang, Hao Guo, Jingxi Li, Jinshuo Zou, Jodie Yuwono, Hongbo Shu, Shilin Zhang, Vanessa K Peterson, Bernt Johannessen, Lars Thomsen, Wenbin Hu, Zaiping Guo
Increasing the charging voltage to 4.6 V directly enhances battery capacity and energy density of LiCoO2 cathodes for lithium-ion batteries. However, issues of the activated harmful phase evolution and surface...
